mapper.update: update tb_reservation set status=#{reservationStatus} where reservation_id=#{id};
mapper.select: select reservation_id,r.status,order_time,days,check_in_time,check_in_name,check_in_phone,i.room_info_id,u.user_id,u.username,u.realname, i.room_num,i.price,i.version from tb_reservation as r left outer join tb_user as u on r.user_id=u.user_id left outer join tb_room_info as i on r.room_info_id=i.room_info_id where reservation_id=#{id}
